    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addResources​(LibraryResources resource)
      adds resources that don't exist already in the library
      void bookLending​(Book bookobject, LibraryMember memberobject)
      it lends a book to a selected library member if the book is in the catalogue, if it is available and if the member has already borrowed less than 5 books
      boolean checkResourcesInCatalogue​(Object resource)
      returns a boolean to attest if a resource is in the catalogue
      void EditTitle​(LibraryResources resource, String newTitle)
      Edits the title of a resource in the catalogue
      int getNumberOfResources()
      it prints the details of all the electronic resources in the catalogue
      void printAllBooks()
      it prints the details of all the books in the catalogue
      void printAllBooksDetails()
      it prints all the details of all the books in the catalogue
      void printAllElectronicResourcesDetails()
      it prints all the details of all the electronic resources in the catalogue
      void printLibraryDetails()
      print all the details
      void removeIndexedResource​(int index)
      it removes the resource that corresponds to the selected index in the catalogue array
      void removeResource​(LibraryResources resourceToRemove)
      it detect a resource by its name and removes it from the catalogue, if the resource is not in the catalogue an appropriate message is printed
      void returnBooks​(Book returnedbook, boolean istheredamage, String newDamage)
      it displays the act of returning a book, the member value goes back to null and new eventual damages are registered.
      void searchByAuthor​(String authorsearch)
      it searches a resource in the catalogue by author and returns how many resources related to the author are in the catalogue
      void searchByIsbn​(String isbn)
      it searches a resource by its Isbn value and returns how many resources with the said Isbn value were found
      Object searchObject​(Object resource)
      it searches a resource in the catalogue by its name and returns it, if the resource is not in the catalogue it returns null
      void sendMessegesToUsers​(String message)
      it sends a message to all the members that borrowed a book

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • returnBooks

        public void returnBooks​(Book returnedbook,
                        boolean istheredamage,
                        String newDamage)
        it displays the act of returning a book, the member value goes back to null and new eventual damages are registered. if the book does not exist an appropriate error message is printed
